channel.title: ElysianX VPS 24/7
channel.description:
This Server has so many great features you will enjoy! Starting with All skills working! Including Hunter & Summoning. There are some awesome fun Minigames to choose from, there are some great reward systems & Pk-Point shops. Following Features Below
Forums - http://elysianx.forumakers.com/ (Just purchased .com domain, waiting for transferal can take up to 48 hours)
Download Link - https://www.dropbox.com/s/1qws491t2kkaqvi/elysian.jar Features -Pk-Point Rewards (Including an awesome shop) -Vote4Cash Rewards -24/7 1gb Linux VPS -Hunter & Summoning -Chaotics & Other dung items! -Primals! -All Nex Items! -Spirit Shields! -Vesta's & Statius's -Over 100 Cool Updated Items! -Great updated Graphics! -Server Updated Daily! -Friendly Community & Staff -Staff Spots (Open) -Pest Control -Jad -Warrior Guild -Dicing & Staking! -Corporeal Beast -Frost Dragons & KBD! -Working On QBD & Nex -100s of more features!
So come join us today! you will not regret
Adventure Starts Here! [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/2wgyyc4.png[/img]
Dicing & Staking! [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/n6z889.png[/img]
Corporeal Beast! [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/2s63j3c.png[/img]
You can change your settings! Awesome Feature! [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/32znnkj.png[/img]
Tormented Demons! [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/fdab6o.png[/img]
There is sooo much more to this RSPS come join today!
